text: look, sheldon, i just don't think that the guys and leonard really meant to hurt you. you know? they just told an unfortunate lie to deal with a difficult situation. okay, you know what it's like? remember that scene in the new star trek movie when kirk has to take over the ship, so he tells spock all that stuff he knew wasn't true, like saying spock didn't care his mom died?
